snippet.sync_client:
from seed import SeedOauthClientCredentials

client = SeedOauthClientCredentials(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
    client_id="YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
    client_secret="YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET",
)
client.auth.get_token_with_client_credentials(
    client_id="client_id",
    client_secret="client_secret",
    scope="scope",
)
snippet.async_client:
import asyncio

from seed import AsyncSeedOauthClientCredentials

client = AsyncSeedOauthClientCredentials(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
    client_id="YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
    client_secret="YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET",
)


async def main() -> None:
    await client.auth.get_token_with_client_credentials(
        client_id="client_id",
        client_secret="client_secret",
        scope="scope",
    )


asyncio.run(main())

snippet.sync_client:
from seed import SeedOauthClientCredentials

client = SeedOauthClientCredentials(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
    client_id="YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
    client_secret="YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET",
)
client.auth.refresh_token(
    client_id="client_id",
    client_secret="client_secret",
    refresh_token="refresh_token",
    scope="scope",
)
snippet.async_client:
import asyncio

from seed import AsyncSeedOauthClientCredentials

client = AsyncSeedOauthClientCredentials(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
    client_id="YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
    client_secret="YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET",
)


async def main() -> None:
    await client.auth.refresh_token(
        client_id="client_id",
        client_secret="client_secret",
        refresh_token="refresh_token",
        scope="scope",
    )


asyncio.run(main())
